div.h1: How to Access Your Child's Teacher's Website

div.p: From the Monroe City School System web page, there is a menu bar link that says "Schools".
Parents will click on that link, and select the name of the school from the drop-down menu.
This will take you , in this example, to the Minnie Ruffin website. The only link that matters now on any individual school site is "Menu".
From the Menu link, parents should select "About Our School", then "Meet the Staff".
This will take parents to an alphabetical listing of all teachers at the school, in this case... Minnie Ruffin Elementary Schools faculty.
